name: Quill
title: Quill
author: Gangsir
contact: The best way to reach me is to PM me on Reddit, at /u/Gangsir. It is also possible to contact me by creating an issue on the github page of this project, in the homepage field.
description: Adds an openable notepad to store notes like ratios, to-do lists, etc. Allows for uninterrupted gameplay while planning.
